title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather requirements from stakeholders across different departments, define the project scope, and document the expected features and functionalities of the CrossFunctionalRFCCollaborator tool. Ensure to include requirements for user authentication, access control, version control, and collaboration features (e.g., commenting, reviewing, approving changes). Consider scalability, performance, security aspects as well, focusing on areas such as data protection, user privacy, and system resilience. In addition, specify minimum viable product (MVP) features, non-functional requirements such as usability, reliability, maintainability, and any potential integration points with existing systems. For collaboration features, consider support for real-time communication, integrating with popular project management tools, and ensuring seamless cross-department collaboration. Lastly, provide clear guidelines for documentation and version control to ensure traceability of changes and facilitate future maintenance.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the backend, frontend, database, and integration points with existing systems.

title: Develop Backend Services
description: Implement the backend services for handling RFC submissions, collaboration, and approval workflows.

title: Develop Frontend User Interface
description: Build the user interface for submitting, viewing, and collaborating on RFCs across different departments.

title: Set up Database and Data Models
description: Design and implement the database schema and data models for storing and managing RFCs, comments, and related metadata.

title: Implement Authentication and Authorization
description: Develop authentication and authorization mechanisms to ensure secure access and permissions for different user roles and departments.

title: Integrate with Existing Systems
description: Integrate the CrossFunctionalRFCCollaborator tool with existing systems and tools used by different departments for seamless collaboration.
dependencies: Set up Database and Data Models

title: Write Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the CrossFunctionalRFCCollaborator tool, covering installation, configuration, and usage instructions.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Perform thorough testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure the quality and reliability of the CrossFunctionalRFCCollaborator tool.

title: Deploy and Monitor
description: Deploy the CrossFunctionalRFCCollaborator tool to production environments, set up monitoring and logging systems, and establish processes for maintenance and updates.
